presentations.description: To use words in mathematical models, we rely on transforming them into some form of numerical representation. One of many algorithms that perform such task is the Word Embedding.

profile: I'm a front-end developer. I'm interested in code architecture and code quality, design systems, CSS animations, natural computing, machine learning and data science. I have experience with JavaScript and TypeScript and I am proficient in HTML and CSS.
My goal is to build products that solve its users' problems while providing a great usability. I like to work closely with the design team, in highly collaborative environments.
